t: What is brand approval for Amazon US and why is it necessary? – Printify
s: After receiving brand approval, go to Store settings in Printify and select the Use unique brand name option. Save the changes. Once done, you can begin adding listings to your Amazon store, and the brand name will be applied automatically.
